mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM f_light l INNER JOIN f_mesh m ON m.id = l.mid INNER JOIN f_project p ON p.id=m.project_id INNER JOIN f_place pl ON pl.id = l.pid INNER JOIN f_group g ON g.id=l.gid LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM f_light_adjust ORDER BY update_date DESC) ls ON ls.lid=l.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND p.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND m.mname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{mname},'%')
AND pl.pname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pname},'%')
AND g.gname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{gname},'%')
AND m.mesh_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{meshId},'%')
AND l.lname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{lname},'%')
AND l.lmac LIKE CONCAT('%',#{lmac},'%')
AND l.pid=#{pid}
AND l.mid=#{mid}
AND l.gid=#{gid}
AND m.project_id=#{projectId}
GROUP BY l.id ORDER BY l.update_date DESC

SELECT l.id, l.mid, IFNULL(l.lname,'null') lname, l.lmac, IFNULL(ls.x,'50') x, IFNULL(ls.y,'50') y, IFNULL(ls.off,'null') off, s.id sid, s.sname, m.project_id, g.id gid, IFNULL(g.gname,'null') gname, p.name, m.mname, m.mesh_id, pl.id pid, pl.pname, IFNULL(s.scount,0) scount FROM f_light l LEFT JOIN f_light_adjust ls ON ls.lid=l.id LEFT JOIN f_group g ON g.id=l.gid LEFT JOIN f_mesh m ON m.id=l.mid LEFT JOIN f_project p ON p.id=m.project_id LEFT JOIN f_place pl ON pl.id=l.pid LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(1) scount,id,sname,mid FROM f_scene GROUP BY mid) s ON s.mid=m.id WHERE l.id=#{id} GROUP BY l.id ORDER BY ls.update_date DESC

SELECT s.id, s.mid, s.scene_id, s.sname, IFNULL(ls.x, '0') x, IFNULL(ls.y, '0') y, CONCAT_WS('，',ls.vertical_angle,ls.horizontal_angle,ls.focus) angle FROM f_light l INNER JOIN f_light_setting ls ON ls.lid = l.id INNER JOIN f_scene s ON ls.sid = s.id WHERE ls.lid = #{id} GROUP BY l.id,sname

#{id}

AND m.id =#{id}
